detectors.description: Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#48-57) ignores return value by token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#54)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#48-57):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#54)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#55)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.buyTokens(address)](repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#L48-L57):
	External calls:
	- [token.mint(beneficiary,tokens)](repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#L54)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](repairResNew/scscN/Privatix_presaleU2.sol#L55)
